
## Description

The Durbin test is a nonparametric test for balanced incomplete designs that reduces to the Friedman test in the case of a complete block design.

## Inputs

1. `Judges`: insert the judges' column.

2. `Treatments`: insert treatment's column.

3. `Traits`: insert trait or variable measured. 

## Reference

`Myles Hollander, Douglas Wolfe, Eric Chicken 1942`. Nonparametric Statistical Methods.
